item.description:
Join us for a fun night of bowling and socializing at Pinz in Milford. Pinz also has a full bar and food menu. This is always a fun time. It is only $5 for bowling on Tuesday nights and $5 for a video game rental card too. Shoe rentals are not included. Each member is responsible for the cost of their own shoe rental, bowling and food/drinks.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near bowling counter. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: $5 Bowling, Drinks, Appetizers and Fun at Pinz, Milford
